changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User1
changeSet.sql: UPDATE listmetadataitem SET label='Membri Comisie' WHERE value = 'membru_comisie' AND list_id=(SELECT id FROM metadatadefinition WHERE name='participant' AND collection_id = (SELECT id FROM metadatacollection WHERE name='participanti' AND documenttype_id = (SELECT id FROM documenttype WHERE name='Minuta sedinta Comisie GL') ) ) ;
